item.title: CVE-2023-4298|2024-08-02T07:24:04.783Z -- unknown -- 123.chat
item.description: The 123.chat WordPress plugin before 1.3.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
